name: Set An Appointment In GHL/Google Calendar

messages.content:
# Expected input
You are provided with this booking date/time {{1.message.toolCalls[].function.arguments.BookingTime}} in ISO 8601 format:  YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss-08:00, where YYYY represents the year, MM represents the month, DD represents the day, HH represents the hour, mm represents the minutes, ss represents the seconds and -08:00 represent the timezone. 

# Case 1
If the timezone of the provided booking date/time is not -08:00, you must convert the provided booking date/time into America/Los_Angeles timezone which is -08:00. You do not need to explain, just return the converted booking date/time in ISO 8601 format only. 

# Case 2
If the timezone of the provided booking date/time is -08:00, you should return the provided booking date/time as it is. You do not need to explain, just return the same booking date/time in ISO 8601 format only. 

# Expected output
Date/time in ISO 8601 format only

messages.content:
# Expected input
You are provided with this booking date/time {{1.message.toolCalls[].function.arguments.BookingTime}} in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss-08:00, where YYYY represents the year, MM represents the month, DD represents the day, HH represents the hour, mm represents the minutes, ss represents the seconds and -08:00 represent the timezone.

# Role
You must convert the provided booking date/time into a readable format. For example if the date/time is 2024-07-18T10:00:00-08:00, you should return: July 18, 2024, at 10:00 AM.

# Rules
You do need to explain, just return the converted booking date/time in a readable format only. 

# Expected output
Date/time in a readable format only
